longDescription: This is a great way to look like Aquaman. This is a Skin tight suit, one piece, with zipper in the back. It is of great quality and stretches to conform to wearer.

name: Morgul Blade
shortDescription: Lord of the Rings Witch King blade
longDescription: Each Morgul Blade is 3D printed and assembled using long steel screws throughout the entirety of the blade to keep it held together strong. The seems for the blade are hidden using glues, filler and paints. Each blade will be coated in several layers of silver spray paint, acrylics for wreathing and color and lastly clear coated for protection. The blade is intended for cosplay and display purposes only, the blade will not be able to take much impact without being damaged or bent.

rating.comment: Would stab Frodo again. A+

name: Nazgul Gauntlets

name: Xena Warrior Princess
shortDescription: Xena Warrior princess costume and cosplay
longDescription: It is a fully handmade, professionally made cosplay. Includes: Top, Skirt, Breastplate, All bracelets, Chakran, Sword, Arm covers, Kneepads. MATERIALS: Faux leather, lycra, PVC, EVA foam. Attention! The color of items in the photos may be slightly different from the actual color depending on lighting and your monitor settings.

rating.comment: took a little while to get here, but it was worth the wait! very solid and sturdy, paint job is amazing, everything looks pretty good! only thing was the ribbon was a little short for me but its probably because my face is chubbier and its an easy fix. would recommend!

name: Stormtrooper
shortDescription: Star Wars Stormtrooper Costume Armor Fully Strapped with Soft Parts - STANDARD SIZE
longDescription: This set includes all of your armor, strapped and Ready-to-Wear, with Helmet and soft parts including Neck Seal, Bodysuit, Balaclava and Pro Trooping Gloves. Unlike a Kit this will not need strapping and includes all your soft parts for an affordable option. Our Stormtrooper Armor is made from high-quality 2.5mm white polished plastic. It has been trimmed with clean edges, and has been professionally strapped with industrial strength Hook and Loop by our team at the Stormtrooper Store.

rating.comment: I still can't seem to hit the broadside of the barn
